Html: I am new to the GMap control. I am trying to use it to display some locations on a map in a Winforms project. I added the references to the 2 DLLs & used some sample code I found on various websites. No matter what I try I cannot get it to work ... it always displays tiles that say "Exception: The operation has timed out" and "We are sorry, but we don't have imagery at this zoom level for this region". I have tried different map providers, zoom levels, locations, etc & I still get the same thing every time. Can someone help me out? I'd really like to use this control. Thanks.
